isLeader

boolean isLeader()
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
If some other node need to find out whether this node is the leader, this is called.

Returns:
boolean whether the leader or not
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

receiveMessage

void receiveMessage(java.lang.String message)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This is general method to pass the messages from host to host. This message will be decoded and will be passed to the Busi. Logic.

message -
Throws:

java.net.UnknownHostException

isDefaultLeader

boolean isDefaultLeader()
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
There is a default leader declared for every STM based clusters. This method will tell whether this node is the default leader or not. Any node can invoke this method.

Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

isLeaderElectionRunning

boolean isLeaderElectionRunning()
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method is used to identify the current state of the epzilla process with getStatus.
Stage isLeaderElectionRunning status
Start up false unknown
after receiving uid true unknown
aftervreceiving leader false leader/nonleader
after receiving a uid true unknown

Returns:
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
